Html:
Hi there,

How easy would it be to create a Harvard Referencing Guide based following DMU's guideline, found in this url? http://www.library.dmu.ac.uk/Images/Selfstudy/Harvard.pdf (this is a public url)

I'd be happy to help with it.

It's a Harvard family style (author-year) so it should not be all that hard. There are several examples of such styles on this site you can start from. The only problem is that not all those types are supported by Word (images and diagrams, ...)
